skills.Name: Dagger Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 3.6 when using a dagger.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 5.3 and Evasion by 3, and decreases the chance of receiving Critical Damage by 15% when equipped with light armor.

skills.Name: Hex
skills.Description: Decreases the enemy's P. Def. by 23% for 30 seconds.

skills.Name: Chain Blow
skills.Description: A stab with your dagger that becomes even more powerful if the target is afflicted with bleed. Deals 460 Physical Damage and an additional 80 Physical Damage if the target is bleeding. Adds 1 Energy.

skills.Name: Heart Breaker
skills.Description: You not only break people's arms, but you break their hearts. Deal 650 Physical Damage and increase your speed by 40, Evasion 5, Critical Damage and Critical Rate by 30%% from behind for 5 seconds. Adds 1 Energy.

skills.Name: Blood Stab
skills.Description: Seeing blood gets you excited. Dig your dagger(s) deep into the targets back dealing 740 Physical Damage and ignoring 30%% P. Def. Additionally bleeds the target for 70 damage every 2 seconds for 8 seconds. Requires 3 stacks of Energy.

skills.Name: Barrage of Nails
skills.Description: You unleash a barrage of knives around you, dealing 460 Physical Damage, slowing targets hit by 20% and rendering them from hide for 6 seconds.

skills.Name: Hide
skills.Description: Who's there? Stealth for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Flash Bluff
skills.Description: Catch your target off-guard. Stunning and turning their vulnerable back to you for 5 seconds.

skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 3.6 when using a dagger.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 5.3 and Evasion by 3, and decreases the chance of receiving Critical Damage by 15% when equipped with light armor.

skills.Name: Acrobatic Move
skills.Description: Increases Evasion by 4 when running.

skills.Name: Esprit
skills.Description: Increases HP Recovery Bonus by 2.5 and MP Recovery Bonus by 1.8 when running.

skills.Name: Quick Step
skills.Description: Increases Speed by 7.
